THE RED FILE :: Weekly Blotter

Thanks for your interest in the FREE weekly email subscription to the Weekly Blotter!

A FREE weekly version of our soon-to-be available digital magazine THE RED FILE, the Weekly Blotter keeps murder mystery & crime fiction fans informed about the latest short stories, novellas, novels and MurderWiki articles available on the site.

By subscribing today, you'll instantly recieve a copy of the exciting murder mystery novella:

by John Baer
